summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers," likely referring to unauthorized web scraping activities. It directs entities to respect robots.txt rules and warns of rate limiting based on IP address. The bill suggests using the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for data acquisition, providing an alternative to scraping. The core intent seems to be to curb improper data collection practices, possibly to protect a website's functionality and resources.
